about.title: About Me

education.title: Education
education.description:
M.Sc.: Applied Mathematics & Computer Science
B.Sc.: Computer Information Systems & Database Management

about.summary: Over 3 years of experience in e-procurement testing. I have expertise in manual testing and automation of UI and API, plus configuring processes in CI/CD. I enjoy watching testing conference videos and am eager and prepared to gain new experiences and knowledge.

works.description: Проверял функциональные требования продукта. Проводил функциональное тестирование web-приложения для B2B и B2C. Поднимал с нуля процессы автоматизации и CI/CD. Активно участвовал в развитии своих проектов и отдела, предлагая новые идеи, помогая решать проблемы с задачами, а также способствовал развитию hard-skills коллег.

works.company: "INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CENTER" OF THE CHUVASH REPUBLIC
works.description: Provided the operation of telecommunications and computer equipment for the executive authorities and local self-government of the Chuvash Republic.
